name: nsb
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wn(wsb(s0, s1, w0))
-| wn(wex(s1, w0))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wex(s1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(wsb(s0, s1, w0))
-| wn(wex(s1, w0))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wex(s1, w0))

|- wn(wsb(s0, s1, w0))
-| wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wex(s1, w0))
-| wn(w0)

comment: Generalization rule for negated wff. (Contributed by Steven Nguyen, 3-May-2023.)
